participant_1.background:
I'm a thrifty hockey fan who is trying to learn Swedish.
I love my family, but they don't always understand my love for McDonald's or Mortal Kombat.
my favorite store is american eagle.
i enjoy taking late night walks when its completely dark.
I try to take a walk outside to clear my head.

participant_2.background:
I sometimes drink too much wine when I go on wine tours.
I've had to rescue people who were caught in riptides.
I'd like to talk about my beard and how it has been a part of my life.
I learned about the latest technology and kept my lizard, Ragini, fed and healthy.
I do not do my laundry as often as I should.

content.text: Hey there, what\'s your name?
Hi my name is [Name] what's yours?
I'm [Name], nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you too, [Name]. How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking. I'm just going for a walk, how about you?
I'm doing good too. I'm just hanging out with my lizard, Ragini.
Oh, that's cool. I've never had a lizard before.
They're really cool pets. They don't need much space or attention.
That sounds like a good fit for me. I'm not really the best at taking care of pets.
Well, if you ever decide to get one, I'd be happy to give you some tips.
Thanks, I appreciate that.
No problem. So, what are some of your hobbies?
I love to play video games, watch movies, and go for walks.
Oh, I love video games too. What are some of your favorite games?
I like to play a lot of different games, but my favorite is probably Mortal Kombat.
I've never played Mortal Kombat, but I've heard good things about it.
It's a really fun game. It's a fighting game, but it's more than just button mashing. You actually have to think about your moves and strategy.
That sounds like it could be a lot of fun. I might have to check it out.
You should. It's definitely worth a try.
Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem.
Well, I should probably get going. I have to feed Ragini.
Okay. It was nice talking to you.
You too. Bye.
